meanings.definition: To utter a loud cry or call.
meanings.sent1: She was shouting for help when she fell down.
meanings.sent2: The children were shouting with joy at the playground.
meanings.sent3: The parrot started shouting back when the phone rang.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was shouting with excitement as she crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The coach kept shouting instructions to the players during the game.

meanings.sent1: His shouting could be heard from across the street.
meanings.sent2: The shouting of the protesters echoed through the square.
meanings.sent3: The shouting of the baby woke up the entire household.
meanings.sent4: The shouting of the fans filled the stadium with energy.
meanings.sent5: The shouting of the alarm alerted everyone in the building.
